channel.title: CVE Feed for GeoVision -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GeoVision -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-3638|2024-08-02T07:01:57.287Z -- geovision -- gv-adr2701
item.description: In GeoVision GV-ADR2701 cameras, an attacker could edit the login response to access the web application.

item.title: CVE-2024-6047|2024-08-01T21:25:03.254Z -- geovision -- gv_dsp_lpr_v2
item.description: Certain EOL GeoVision devices fail to properly filter user input for the specific functionality. Unauthenticated remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary system commands on the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-6047|2024-06-17T14:06:47.780Z -- geovision -- gv_dsp_lpr_v2
item.description: Certain EOL GeoVision devices fail to properly filter user input for the specific functionality. Unauthenticated remote attackers can exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary system commands on the device.
